biography: Alfred Thomas Highmore is an English former child actor best known for his roles in the films "Finding Neverland", "Charlie and the Chocolate Factory", "Arthur and the Invisibles", "August Rush", "The Golden Compass" and "The Spiderwick Chronicles". He currently stars as Norman Bates in "Bates Motel" A&E's contemporary prequel series of the film "Psycho".
name: Freddie Highmore
